fullSentence: 虽然他很忙但是他还是来了
pinyin: suī rán tā hěn máng dàn shì tā hái shì lái le
english: Although he was busy, he still came

fullSentence: 我对中国文化很感兴趣
pinyin: wǒ duì zhōng guó wén huà hěn gǎn xìng qù
english: I am very interested in Chinese culture

fullSentence: 请把门关上好吗
pinyin: qǐng bǎ mén guān shàng hǎo ma
english: Please close the door, okay?

fullSentence: 这个地方的风景特别美
pinyin: zhè gè dì fang de fēng jǐng tè bié měi
english: The scenery here is especially beautiful

fullSentence: 他被老师批评了
pinyin: tā bèi lǎo shī pī píng le
english: He was criticized by the teacher

fullSentence: 如果你有时间就来找我
pinyin: rú guǒ nǐ yǒu shí jiān jiù lái zhǎo wǒ
english: If you have time, come find me

fullSentence: 我们应该保护环境
pinyin: wǒ men yīng gāi bǎo hù huán jìng
english: We should protect the environment

fullSentence: 他的性格很开朗
pinyin: tā de xìng gé hěn kāi lǎng
english: His personality is very cheerful

fullSentence: 这条裙子是她自己做的
pinyin: zhè tiáo qún zi shì tā zì jǐ zuò de
english: This skirt was made by herself

fullSentence: 我打算明年去中国留学
pinyin: wǒ dǎ suàn míng nián qù zhōng guó liú xué
english: I plan to study abroad in China next year

fullSentence: 这本书我看了两遍
pinyin: zhè běn shū wǒ kàn le liǎng biàn
english: I read this book twice

fullSentence: 她一边唱歌一边跳舞
pinyin: tā yī biān chàng gē yī biān tiào wǔ
english: She sings while dancing

fullSentence: 我不小心把杯子打破了
pinyin: wǒ bù xiǎo xīn bǎ bēi zi dǎ pò le
english: I accidentally broke the cup

fullSentence: 这个问题我需要考虑一下
pinyin: zhè gè wèn tí wǒ xū yào kǎo lǜ yī xià
english: I need to think about this question

fullSentence: 他对每个人都很热情
pinyin: tā duì měi gè rén dōu hěn rè qíng
english: He is very warm to everyone

fullSentence: 你最好提前预约
pinyin: nǐ zuì hǎo tí qián yù yuē
english: You'd better make a reservation in advance

fullSentence: 我终于完成了这个任务
pinyin: wǒ zhōng yú wán chéng le zhè gè rèn wù
english: I finally completed this task

fullSentence: 这个消息让我很惊讶
pinyin: zhè gè xiāo xi ràng wǒ hěn jīng yà
english: This news surprised me

sentenceWithBlank: 他不但会说英语___会说法语
fullSentence: 他不但会说英语而且会说法语
pinyin: tā bú dàn huì shuō yīng yǔ ér qiě huì shuō fǎ yǔ
english: He can speak not only English but also French

fullSentence: 我们必须按时完成工作
pinyin: wǒ men bì xū àn shí wán chéng gōng zuò
english: We must finish the work on time

fullSentence: 这件事情跟他没有关系
pinyin: zhè jiàn shì qíng gēn tā méi yǒu guān xi
english: This matter has nothing to do with him

fullSentence: 他们正在讨论这个计划
pinyin: tā men zhèng zài tǎo lùn zhè gè jì huà
english: They are discussing this plan

fullSentence: 你应该注意身体健康
pinyin: nǐ yīng gāi zhù yì shēn tǐ jiàn kāng
english: You should pay attention to your health

fullSentence: 除了他以外大家都来了
pinyin: chú le tā yǐ wài dà jiā dōu lái le
english: Everyone came except him

fullSentence: 我不太了解这个情况
pinyin: wǒ bú tài liǎo jiě zhè gè qíng kuàng
english: I don't really understand this situation
